revised_title: The Development of the Ossicula Auditus in Higher Mammalia
tldr: The author examines the development of the ossicles of hearing in higher mammals, specifically focusing on the ossicula auditus. They provide a historical overview of previous theories and present their own observations on the origin and development of the malleus, incus, and stapes, concluding that these structures arise from the cartilages of the first and second post-oral arches.
